body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Scott Barnes and I'm from XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marilyn. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's three zero five zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Also, can you confirm the first three letters of your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for sharing that information, Marilyn. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a billing issue with my recent service appointment and I'm feeling quite excited about getting it resolved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Marilyn. Let me assist you with that. Thank you for providing the necessary details. We will look into this matter further for you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Marilyn. If you have any more questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
